basics.name: Andreas Adam
basics.label: Frontend Architect, Team Lead, Tech Lead
basics.summary: Lead Front-end Engineer, Tech Lead, Team Lead with many years of senior expertise in web software development and in leading agile development teams in mixed local and remote settings. With a highly versatile skill set both in engineering as well as project discovery, architecture, and sales support for award-winning projects. I am sharing my expertise through consulting and training for developers and companies and as a speaker at international conferences and local meetups. I am a keen advocate for open source and I love learning new technologies, dealing with interesting data, and creating things that impress with brilliant UX. I lead by example and value knowledge transfer to move a company and her developers forward by introducing new technologies and quality standards.
